{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24339v1", "title": "A family of indecomposable rank-$n$ vector bundles on $\mathbb
  P^n\times\mathbb P^n$ in positive characteristics", "summary": "We construct a sequence of rank-$n$ indecomposable vector bundles on $\mathbb
P^n\times\mathbb P^n$ for every $n\geq 2$ and in every positive characteristic
that are not pullbacks via any map $\mathbb P^n\times\mathbb P^n\to \mathbb
P^{m} $", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG", "published": "2025-03-31T17:25:17Z"}
